entry.title: PO Flexible WF Approval Step Names
entry.content:
Hi Team,

Please help to get the below details for PO Flexible WF. If any standard Class or FM or CDS view or tables it will help. I want to extract a month data for each PO the below details. Mainly the problem is with WF Step Name.

I know these tables but not getting the expected. Kindly help

SSW_CONT / SWW_CONTOB

SWWCNTP0

SWWLOGHIST

SWWUSERWI

SWWWIEAD

SWW_WI2OBJ

SWF_FLEX_RPOC

Thanks in advance.

By Gowtham.

entry.title: How to customize push notification payload to send additional data from S4 to SSAM
entry.content:
Currently in the standard push notification feature for SAP Service and Asset Manager, only the object key of particular object like Notification number for Notification and Order Id for Work Order is sent to mobile device in push notification payload. Sample payload:

{"notification":{"alert":"{\"title-loc-key\":\"NOTIF_TITLE_KEY\",\"title-loc-args\": [\"1000000000\"],\"loc-key\":\"NOTIF_BODY_KEY\",\"loc-args\": [\"1000000000\"]}","data":"{\"ObjectType\":\"Notification\",\"ObjectID\":\"1000000000\"}"}

But we want to show additional details in the push notification message like notification description and technical object description. We found the exact method which generates the payload. Class /MFND/CL_CORE_OTRIG_CPMS_PUSH  and method is BUILD_JSON_DATA.

But in this method, we are only able to get Object Key (Notification Number) and no other data. Also we are not able to fetch relevant data from table as notification is not yet saved.

Does anyone knows how can we handle this situation and how to send additional data like Technical object description in this payload. Any BAdI available for this or how to achieve this?

entry.title: job_output_info getting empty
entry.content:
i am working on one project that has module pool program in that one screen and one button.

i am suffering to solve error is that job_output_info is empty when i run program then first print preview dialog open and when i come back from print preview job_output_info is empty.

ls_control-no_dialog = 'X'.
ls_control-preview = ' '.
ls_control-no_open = ' '.
ls_control-no_close = 'X'.
ls_control-getotf = 'X'.
ls_control-device = 'PRINTER'.
ls_output-tddest = 'LP01'.
ls_output-tddataset = 'BOH'.
ls_output-tdsuffix2 = 'HEALTH LETTR'.

CALL FUNCTION lv_name
EXPORTING
control_parameter = ls_control
output_options = ls_output
user_settings = ' '
payslip_id = ph11-payslip_id
emp_dept_data = emp_dept_data
IMPORTING
job_output_info = ls_job_output_info
TABLES
itab_emp_payslip_ite3 = itab_emp_payslip_ite3.

entry.title: How to Unassign Freight Unit (FU) from Freight Order (FO) using BOPF action in ABAP (SCMTMS/TOR)?
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,

I am working on an ABAP development requirement within SAP Transportation Management (TM) and need to programmatically unassign a Freight Unit (FU) from a Freight Order (FO).

In an other development method DO_ACTION of class /bobf/if_tra_service_manager was used to assign to freight unit to freight order with the following code:

 

DATA: lo_srv_mgr    TYPE REF TO /bobf/if_tra_service_manager.

*-- Initialize service manager for TOR
  lo_srv_mgr = /bobf/cl_tra_serv_mgr_factory=>get_service_manager( /scmtms/if_tor_c=>sc_bo_key ).

  TRY.
      CALL METHOD lo_srv_mgr->do_action
        EXPORTING
          iv_act_key    = /scmtms/if_tor_c=>sc_action-root-add_fu_by_fuid   
          it_key        = VALUE #( ( key = <la_un>-db_key_odn ) )     "GUID FREIGHT ORDER
*         it_key        = lt_n_fo_key
          is_parameters = NEW /scmtms/s_tor_a_add_elements( string = lv_fu_str )  " FREIGHT UNI
*         is_parameters = lr_s_parameters
        IMPORTING
          eo_message    = lo_message
          et_failed_key = DATA(lt_fail).
    CATCH /bobf/cx_frw_contrct_violation.
  ENDTRY.

Now I was thinking about doing something similar, but I can't find the right action key among costants in /scmtms/if_tor_c=>sc_action .

Any suggestions?
Thanks in advance

entry.title: Automating Unique Item Identifier Generation in CO01 Transaction
entry.content:
Hi All, 


I want to automate the generation of the Unique Item Identifier (UII) in transaction CO01 during production order creation. The UII value should be fetched from a custom table. Could you please suggest the appropriate BAdI or user exit to implement this functionality?

Thanks

tried using structure 'CPS_TASK_LIST_MAINT_PRT' and  'CPS_TASK_LIST_MAINT_PRT_X'  of FM 'ROUTING_MAINTAIN' and 'BAPI_ES_ROUTING_CHANGE'   but not woking.

If anyone has already done this, please help.

entry.title: Text area in a modal dialog box
entry.content:
Hi, 

I have created a screen as a modal dialog box and added custom control so that i want to enter multiple email recipients but when i called screen it is not showing text area in editable mode but if called it as a normal screen then it is working fine. Please share your thoughts. 

 

REPORT ztest_textarea.
START-OF-SELECTION.
  DATA lt_text TYPE TABLE OF text_512.
  DATA(lo_container) = NEW cl_gui_custom_container( 'TEXTAREA' ).
  DATA(lo_textedit) = NEW cl_gui_textedit( parent = lo_container
                                           wordwrap_mode = cl_gui_textedit=>wordwrap_at_fixed_position ).
  lo_textedit->set_toolbar_mode( 0 ).
  CALL SCREEN 1001 STARTING AT 10 10 ENDING AT 50 80.

Regards,

Ravi

entry.title: SAP Query creation date issue
entry.content:
Hello Team, 

I am facing one issue in SAP query, 

Requirement: - Just to remove field hardcode value in Query, & field level condition in Infoset.

Now After regenerate Infoset & adjust to query, one field is not visible in selection screen of Query.  

In SQ01, creation date field select option check box is not visible inside query. and it is greyed out in the selection list, so because of this creation date is not visible in selection screen.

What should I do to get the field in selection screen?

Copy line item serial number from the service order to the sales order via forward exchange(CL_CRMS4_PROC_SALESDOC_FWD). We are unable to find a solution.

entry.title: user Exit for FB02
entry.content:
Hello Everyone,

Kindly provide the user exit or BAdI for transaction FB02.
Our requirement is to restrict editing of the Payment Block key (ZLSPR) field. Only authorized or specific users should be allowed to make changes to this field.

Advance Thanks.

entry.title: How to find the Class with Material Number (MATNR) or Configuration (CUOBJ)?
entry.content:
Hi all,

I am looking for a way to find the class of a configurable (KMAT) material with class type 300, based on the material number (MATNR) or the configuration (CUOBJ). Note the the characteristics have do not yet have any values assigned in the material master.

The material number and CUOBJ are retrieved from the sales order item (table VBAP).

I have tried the following tables:

  • KSSK
  • INOB
  • AUSP
  • CABN
  • KLAH

But I could not find any results for the material number or CUOBJ.

Any tips on how this can be achieved? Which tables can be linked?

Thanks in advance,

 

Floyd

entry.title: CL_FDT_XL_SPREADSHEET to extract rich text
entry.content: Is there an SAP note that indicates that we can't extract rich text (aka excel cell with underline/bold/italic formatting) using CL_FDT_XL_SPREADSHEET

entry.title: how to not skips cleanup when SINGLE_SYNC throws an error
entry.content:
Hello,

I am calling in my code CL_GUI_HTML_VIEWER~SHOW_URL, that calls the function 'DP_SYNC_URLS' and this function calls CL_DATAPROVIDER=>SYNC.

The problem is that when SYNC fails for document A â†’ exception is raised before it refreshes RESULT_TAB and RESULT_TAB remains polluted with A bad URL.

If I call again CL_GUI_HTML_VIEWER~SHOW_URL for document B, Internally SAP calls SYNC again, SYNC sees RESULT_TAB still contains the bad entry, and SYNC raises the same error again, even though document B is good.

How can I prevent this behaviour?

entry.title: Inbound delivery creation issue..
entry.content:
SELECT SINGLE a~ebeln,
              a~ebelp,
              a~matnr,
              b~lifnr,
              a~werks,
              a~menge,
              a~lgort,
              a~meins,
              b~aedat
             FROM ekpo AS a
            INNER JOIN ekko AS b ON a~ebeln = b~ebeln
         INTO @DATA(ls_ekko)
WHERE a~ebeln = '4400001592'.


DATA : ls_vbsk    TYPE vbsk,

       ls_komdlgn TYPE komdlgn,
       lt_komdlgn TYPE TABLE OF komdlgn,
       ls_vbfs    TYPE vbfs,
       lt_vbfs    TYPE TABLE OF vbfs,
       ls_vbls    TYPE vbls,
       lt_vbls    TYPE TABLE OF vbls.



ls_vbsk-bedat = sy-datum.     " Delivery date




CLEAR ls_komdlgn.
*ls_komdlgn- = ls_ekko-ebeln.  " Item number
ls_komdlgn-posnr = ls_ekko-ebelp.  " Item number
ls_komdlgn-kzazu = 'X'.  " Item number
ls_komdlgn-matnr = ls_ekko-matnr.  " Material number
ls_komdlgn-spdnr = ls_ekko-lifnr.   " Vendor number
ls_komdlgn-werks = ls_ekko-werks.    " Plant
ls_komdlgn-lgort = ls_ekko-lgort.    " Storage location
ls_komdlgn-kcmeng = ls_ekko-menge.     " Quantity
ls_komdlgn-meins = ls_ekko-meins.      " Unit of measure
ls_komdlgn-lfart = 'EL'.  " Delivery type (e.g., EL for inbound delivery)
APPEND ls_komdlgn TO lt_komdlgn.



CALL FUNCTION 'GN_DELIVERY_CREATE'
  EXPORTING
    vbsk_i               = ls_vbsk
    no_commit            = 'X'
    if_synchron          = 'X'
*   VBLS_POS_RUECK       = ' '
*   IF_CREATE_DEC        = ' '
*   IF_NO_DEQUE          = ' '
*   IT_HANDLING_UNITS    =
*   IF_QUAN_NO_CHECK     =
*   IF_MASS_READ_MAT_SW  = ' '
*   IS_DELIVERY_EXTEND   =
*   IS_CONTROL           =
*   IS_BORGR_CONTROL     =
*   IF_NO_INIT           = ' '
    if_no_partner_dialog = 'X'
*   IF_CHECK_UOM         = ' '
*   IT_LECOMP            =
*   IF_CALL_ACTIVITY     = ' '
*   I_REF_LE_SHP_TM_PACK_PROPOSAL       =
*   IMPORTING
*   VBSK_E               =
*   ET_SPLITPROT         =
*   ET_VBADR             =
*   ET_VBPA              =
  TABLES
    xkomdlgn             = lt_komdlgn
    xvbfs                = lt_vbfs
    xvbls                = lt_vbls
*   XXLIPS               =
*   XVERKO               =
*   XVERPO               =
*   IT_GN_PARTNER        =
*   IT_GN_LIPSPO         =
*   IT_GN_LIPSRF         =
*   IT_GN_TEXTH          =
*   IT_GN_TEXTL          =
*   IT_GN_HUSERNR        =
*   IT_GN_SERNR          =
*   IT_TMSTMP            =
*   ET_SPE_VBFS          =
*   IT_BAPIADDR1         =
*   IT_GN_HU_HEADER_EPC  =
*   IT_GN_HU_ITEMS_EPC   =
*   IT_GN_HURES          =
  .

entry.title: Call Back API in Webdynpro.
entry.content:
Hi All,

I am creating a webdynpro application which will contain two input fields and one save button. On click of save, it will call an external URL which will do some authentication(user ID and password authentication for material changes done on webdynpro). I can able to call the URL using create_external_window method. How can I get the response from that called URL on whether the authentication has been successfull or not so that I save the data entered in webdynpro. Kindly help me by providing any particular method.

 

Regards,

Ariharasudhan S.

entry.title: ZLOCAL is not a valid software component for package Zxx_TUTORIALS in Eclipse ADT 2022-09
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

I am using Eclipse 2022-09 with ABAP Development Tools (ADT), and I am having trouble creating a new Z-package.

Issue 1: ZLOCAL is not accepted (TR458)

When I select the software component ZLOCAL, I get:


ZLOCAL is not a valid software component for package ZXX_TUTORIALS (TR458)

It also required choosing a transport layer, which I believe should not happen for a LOCAL component.

Issue 2: HOME also asks for a Transport Layer

If I select HOME, the system again requests a transport layer.
After choosing a layer, I get this error:

 
System setting does not allow you to change R3TR DEVC Zxx_TUTORIALS
Message No. TR006

Diagnosis says:

  • HOME is not modifiable in this SAP system

  • Modifiability must be changed in Transport Organiser Tools â†’ System Change Options

  • System Details

    • Eclipse 2022-09

    • Latest ADT

    • SAP backend: S/4HANA (on-premise)

      Any help or direction will be appreciated.
      Thank you!

entry.title: DRF Replication to Multiple Target Systems (F51/F52/F53) â€“ Feasibility Question
entry.content:
Hello,

We are going to configure DRF replication from FCW to F51 / F52 / F53 at the same time.
I would like to know if there is a way to replicate to all three systems in parallel without requiring to intervene each time to mark one system as the default port.

In other words, Is it technically possible for DRF to send the same data to multiple outbound ports simultaneously, or does DRF always require one system to be flagged as the default for each replication model?

we did a test with preproduction systems without selecting any logical ports however we see the message is failing in the source system.

NB: we used service groups so the logical ports are generated automatically.

We are in central configuration (central system is called D5W)

Regards!


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: "LT_HRP1001" is not type-compatible with formal parameter "IT_HRP1001".
entry.content:
Dear experts

I have the following error:

"LT_HRP1001" is not type-compatible with formal parameter "IT_HRP1001".

This is my code:

DATA: lt_hrp1001 TYPE TABLE OF hrp1001.

    SELECT *
      FROM hrp1001
      INTO TABLE @LT_hrp1001
      WHERE plvar = '01'
        AND ( objid IN @LT_posiciones OR sobid IN @LT_posiciones )
        AND subty IN ( 'A012', 'A002', 'BZ03', 'BZ01' )
        AND begda <= @SY-DATUM
        AND endda >= @SY-DATUM.

 

CALL METHOD me->evaluar_cambio_encargado_optim(
            EXPORTING
              iv_fecha      = lv_fecha_inicial
              iv_posicion   = lv_posicion
              iv_fechaf     = lv_fecha_final
              iv_depart     = ls_department
              it_hrp1001    = lt_hrp1001
              it_hrp1013    = lt_hrp1013
            IMPORTING
              ev_cod_encargado     = lv_sachz
              ev_num_unidad_planif = lv_id_unid_plan ).

Regards

entry.content:
hi viewers,
